Name: Adresses
Description: ['Location of addresses throughout the national territory.']

Name: ARIA (Analyse, Recherche et Information sur les Accidents)
Atlas régionaux des inégalités environnementales
Description: ['Construction of environmental and regional atlas exposure maps for four Metallic Traces Elements (Cd, Cr, Ni, Pb) and HAP']
Subthématic: Indicateurs d'exposition spatialisés agrégés et combinés

Name: Banque du sous-sol
Description: ['The BSS identifies the reports of all the works of the BSS (more than 700,000 books described, associated with more than 2,000,000 pages of technical documents). The Sub-Sol Data Bank (BSS) contains raw geological and technical information relating to underground works: location, object, geological description, technical equipment of drilling. Information made available to the public in the documents of the Bank of the Sub-Sol (BSS) is provided by third parties under the provisions of the Code Minier (arts. 131 to 136).']

Name: Banque nationale d'Accès aux Données sur les Eaux Souterraines
Description: ['Quantitative data (level of napples) and qualitative (concentration of many parameters) related to groundwater: 263 r\U0010fc03seau\U0010fc04s containing 75954 d\U0010fc01s containing 4265 piezometers and 72975 qualitometers.']
Year: Variable selon les données - en cours

Name: Banque nationale des ventes réalisées par les distributeurs de produits phytosanitaires
Description: ["Sales data for phytopharmaceutical products from distributors' statements (or farmers who bought abroad)"]

Name: Base DDIE
Description: ['For the so-called "metallic" mines: positioning of deposits, chemical analysis and NITON for the most important deposits, positioning of the main issues. Regrouping sector deposits. Classification of these sectors based on the potential health and environmental impact of the deposits they contain. Geographic contours are also available for certain deposits. For coal mines: only positioning and bypassing deposits.']
Subthématic: Inventaire des dépôts de résidus miniers
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol| polluants de l'air
Related Datasets: Mise à jour en fonction des nouvelles données acquises dans le cadre d'autres études

Name: Base de Données Carbone France
Description: ['Organic carbon content: Measured and georeferenced profiles containing information on soil carbon content']
Subthématic: Propriétés physico-chimiques des sols et occupation des terres

Name: Base de données d'analyse des terres (BDAT)
Description: ['With the collaboration of soil analysis laboratories accredited by the Ministry of Agriculture, the Gis Sol provides aggregated results, derived from the treatment of the analyses of the BDAT (base of data for soil analyses), which is more than 2 million samples of soil surface areas grown in France between 1990 and 2014. More than 26 million analysis results are grouped in the database.']
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol| composés organiques| métaux
Temporal Coverage: données agrégées par période de 5 ans

Name: Base de données des pratiques et niveaux d’exposition aux musiques amplifiées du jeune public
Description: ['Levels and individual listening times of music at the headphones or with earphones, equipment used, other sources of exhibition (frequentation of amplified music venues, musical practice, video games)']
Subthématic: Levels of exposure to amplified young public music

Name: Base de Données Eléments Traces Métalliques (BDETM)
Description: ['Analysis of regulatory ETM content on land receiving urban wastewater sludge. Statistics are calculated on sub-populations by 10-year time frame.']
Temporal Coverage: données agrégées par période de 10 ans

Name: Base de données géographiques des sols de France
Description: ['Soil Type: Pedal processes responsible for soil differentiation, i.e. brownification, leaching, podzolisation, hydromorphia, etc.']
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol | composés organiques| métaux
Related Datasets: BDAT, BDETM, BDCF, European Soil Database

Name: Base de données sur la qualité des sols urbains
Description: ['Main analyses: arsenic, copper, chrome, lead, zinc, nickel, cadmium, mercury, total cyanides, phenol index, carbonated fractions of hydrocarbons C10 to C40, PCB indicators, 7 PCDD and 10 PCDF and metadata']
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol| composés organiques| métaux

Name: BASIAS - Inventaire historique de Sites Industriels et Activités de Service
Description: ['The inventory of former industrial activities and service activities has been systematically carried out at the departmental level since 1994. The data collected in these inventories are archived in a national database, BASIAS (Base des Anciens Sites Industriels and Service Activities) available on the Internet.']
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol| composés organiques| métaux

Name: BASOL
Description: ['Polluted sites and soils (or potentially polluted) calling for action by the public authorities, either preventive or curative. Site identification and location, site characterization, site description, site technical situation and characterization of the impact, use and environment of the site, impact observations, site monitoring and restriction of use, treatments performed']
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol| composés organiques| métaux
Geographical information level: Point de mesure (Adresse et coordonnées x/y)

Name: BD Lisa
Description: ['This repository includes the following geographic data sets:- Hydrogeological entities of level 3 (local);- Elementary polygons delimiting each single stack of hydrogeological entities;- Karstic areas, areas characterized as karstic environments or powering karst sources;- Alterate areas furniture, polygons of extension of areas within which the presence of altered geological formations (saprolite) has been highlighted or is assumed.']

Name: BD Topage
Description: ['The BD TOPAGE® consists of data sets * watercourses, water bodies, hydrographic sections, elementary surfaces, hydrographic nodes (sources and excutories), land-sea limits, watersheds and topographical watersheds (the last three data sets * will be replaced by more precise data in the medium term).']

Name: Biosurveillance des Retombées Atmosphériques Métalliques par les Mousses
Description: ['The BRAMM device allows to map and model concentrations of metal and nitrogen contaminants in forest foams throughout the metropolitan area. Five-year campaigns have been carried out since 1996 (1996, 2000, 2006, 2011 and 2016), covering approximately 500 collection sites across the country. These sites are located in rural areas, away from local sources of pollution, and forest, under tree cover. General description of the site; Element concentration values (Al, As, Cd, Cr, Cu, Fe, Hg, N, Ni, Pb, Sb, V, Zn + other elements depending on the countryside)']

Name: Campagne Nationale Exploratoire des Pesticides
Description: ['Led by ANSES, launched in June 2018 over 12 months. Measure (harmonized) of 75 substances; 1,300 analyses for each of these substances. 100 000 data collected over one year, 1,800 samples analysed and 75 substances measured at 50 sites in the national territory']

Name: Carroyage DFCI
Description: ['DFCI is a geographical mesh used in France by fire-foresters (DFCI).']

Name: Carte IGN
Description: ['Cartographic background proposed by the National Institute of Geographical and Forest Information (IGN).']

Name: Carte interactive - part de la superficie drainée dans la superficie agricole utilisée (SAU) en 2010
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['This is the drained area or drained by a network of buried drains. Do not take into account the superfcies whose drains no longer evacuate, nor those that are drained only on time (capture of mustard), using a single drain and not a network.']

Name: Carte interactive - production brute standard (PBS) moyenne par exploitation en 2010
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['Agricultural surfaces and livestock are valued according to coefficients allowing the calculation of standard gross production (PBS). These coefficients result from the average values calculated from 2005 to 2009. The PBS describes a potential for the production of farms and allows them to be classified as "medium and large farms" when it is greater than or equal to 25,000 euros, in "large farms" when it is greater than or equal to 100,000 euros.']

Name: Carte topographique IGN
Description: ['The topographic map accurately represents the relief, symbolized by level curves, as well as the details of the terrain: roads, trails, constructions, wood, isolated trees, rivers, sources...']

Name: Cartes des antennes et des mesures radioélectriques
Description: ['Location of radio stations and access, for a given site, to the results of synthesized electromagnetic field measurements']

Name: Cartes des sols métropolitains
Description: ['Representation of different types of dominant soils in Metropolitan France.']

Name: Cartes stratégiques de bruit - rapportage européen
Description: ['National noise mapping produced by the Cerema for the European report']

Name: Cartographie départementale de l'aléa amiante environnemental
Description: ['Cartography of the susceptibility of asbestos presence in formations that may contain asbestos minerals (with samples for mineralogic and analytical purposes). Inventory complemented by the expertise of the amicable potential of about 50 careers.']
Subthématic: Amiante naturel en affleurements dans les formations géologiques
Temporal Coverage: variable selon la révision des données cartographiques

Name: Cartographie du potentiel radon des formations géologiques
Description: ['Cartography of areas where radon presence at high concentrations in buildings is most likely.']

Name: Cartographie régionale du bruit en Île-de-France
Description: ['Noise mapping associated with road traffic, air traffic and rail traffic according to the Lden and Ln indicators, map of areas beyond regulatory limits, as well as associated population noise exposure statistics.']
Subthématic: Cartography of noise associated with traffics

Name: Casier viticole informatisé
Organizations: Direction générale des douanes et droits indirects
Description: ['The electronic wine recorder (CVI) is a tool that the Member States of the European Union must make mandatory. It contains, inter alia, all information relating to wine-producing companies, planted or harvested plots, production and stock levels.']

Name: Ciblex
Description: ['Compile the descriptive parameters of the French population (age, sex, space-time budget and food consumption...) according to the occupancy of soils (continental area, water surface...) and type use (residential, professional, recreational...)']
Subthématic: Descriptive parameters of the French population

Name: Connaissance et qualité des eaux de surface
Description: ['Physico-chemical analysis and environmental conditions of surface water quality, faunistic or floristic list, biological sampling, measurement network, measuring station, face area, taxon biological indices']

Name: Contours IRIS
Description: ['Geometrical contours of areas defined by INSEE for the needs of censuses on all communes of more than 10,000 inhabitants and most municipalities of 5,000 to 10,000 inhabitants.']

Name: CORINE Land Cover
Description: ['Biophysical inventory of soil occupancy and its evolution according to a nomenclature in 44 positions. This inventory is produced by visual interpretation of satellite images. The production scale is 1/100 000. CLC allows to map homogeneous units of soil occupancy with a minimum surface of 25 ha. This database was launched in 1985. The 1990s, 2000, 2006, 2012 and 2018 were produced.']
Data Format (DCAT AP): MapInfo TAB file| E00| Esri Shape
Other Access point: DataGouv / Géoportail (uniquement visualisable et carte pdf téléchargeable)
Related Datasets: Base des changements (données sur les portions des territoires ayant changées d'occupation)

Name: Couches géographiques des secteurs
Description: ['Geographical strains of sectors belonging to the same UDI by region and year']

Name: Croisement INSEE/DARES (thèse Tim Vlaar)
Description: ['"Association of Professional Activities and Metal Exposure with Two Neurodegenerative Diseases from the National Health Data System"']

Name: Cultures par canton
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['All farmsPets and farmsMoyennes and large farmsLarge farms']

Name: Cultures par commune
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['Operations with corresponding area (hectares)']

Name: Cultures par parcs nationaux et parcs régionaux
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['Operations with corresponding area (hectares)']

Name: Délimitations parcellaires AOC viticoles (INAO)
Description: ['Representation of the square delimitations of the appellations of controlled origin (AOC) wineries on Metropolitan France.']

Name: Données de modèle Arpège essentielles OMM
Description: ['Fields of analysis and forecast in grid points from the French air forecast model Arpège on a global grid with resolution 2°5. The data is updated twice a day, and available up to 4 days of forecast deadline, by 24 hours, at sea level, 850 and 500 hectopascals (about 1500 and 5500 meters above sea level).']

Name: Données de modèle atmosphérique à aire limitée
Description: ['Fields of analysis and forecast in grid points, derived from the Aladin air model on 5 areas (France metropolitan, Antilles-Guyane, Rénuion, Polynesia, Nouvelle-Calédonie). Parameters, levels, deadlines and areas set according to various resolutions and deadlines up to H+84h.']

Name: Données de modèle de prévision d'ensemble ARPEGE
Description: ['Fields of forecasting in regular grid points on various geographical areas derived from the French global air forecasting model Arpege. Probabilistic data consisting of all 35 short-term deterministic forecast runs. Parameters, levels, deadlines and sub-domains set according to various resolutions and deadlines up to H+108 h maximum per step of 3 or 6 h depending on the geographical area']

Name: Données HAP HAM et métaux de 2016 à 2019
Description: ['Average annual concentrations of HAM-HAP and metals per station']

Name: Données horaires
Description: ['Climate data from all French stations since their opening, for all available parameters. These data have undergone climate control. Access to the entire depth of the database is possible, with a very wide range of parameters.']
Data Format (DCAT AP): Excel XLSX| HTML| Esri ASCII grid

Name: Données SYNOP
Description: ["Observation data from the International Synoptic Surface Observing Code (SYNOP) messages on the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) global telecommunications system. Atmospheric parameters measured (temperature, humidity, wind direction and force, atmospheric pressure, precipitation height) or observed (sensitive time, cloud description, visibility) from the earth's surface. Depending on local instrumentation and specificities, other parameters can be available (snow height, soil condition, etc.)"]

Name: emi idf departement 2015
Description: ['Emissions for all sectors of activity.']

Name: emi idf epci 2015
Description: ['Emissions for all sectors of activity.']

Name: emi idf region 2015
Description: ['Emissions for all sectors of activity.']

Name: Etude de l'Alimentation Totale 2 (EAT)
Description: ['Average content in various chemical contaminants in foods "as consumed" (445 substances)']

Name: Eurosun / HelioClim 1
Description: ['Measuring the exposure of individuals and populations in Europe to UV radiation by using the data of meteorological satellites. From the UV database prepared by ARMINES (Prof. L Wald), an atlas of UV irradiation has been developed by averaging daily UVA and UVB irradiations per month and for four 5-year periods (1988-1992; 1993-1997; 1998-2002; 2003-2007) for Europe as a whole and for individual countries in the region, for UVA, UVB and total UV irradiations, at both absolute and relative levels.']
Subthématic: Exposure of individuals and populations in Europe to UV radiation

Name: exp idf idf 2017 no2 moyennne annuelle
Description: ['Exposure of populations and territories to pollutant NO2. This layer concerns exposure for the entire Île-de-France region to the "40 μg/m3 annual average NO2" criterion for the year 2017. The following values are shown in the layer: nbre_hab_expo: number of inhabitants exposed to the area exposed in km2']

Name: exp idf idf 2017 pm10 35j sup 50ug
Description: ['Population and Territory exposure to PM10 pollutant. This layer concerns exposure for the entire Ile-de-France region to the criterion "35 days greater than 50μg/m3" for the year 2017. The following values are shown in the layer: nbre_hab_expo: number of inhabitants exposed to surface area_expo: exposed area in km2longur_voirie_expo: road length exposed in km']

Name: exp idf idf 2017 pm10 moyenne annuelle 40
Description: ['Population and Territory exposure to PM10 pollutant. This layer concerns exposure for the whole of the Île-de-France region to the "40 μg/m3 annual average PM10" criterion for the year 2017. The following values are shown in the layer: nbre_hab_expo: number of inhabitants exposed to surface area_expo: exposed area in km2longur_voirie_expo: road length exposed in km']

Name: exp idf zag 2017 no2 moyennne annuelle
Description: ['Exposure of populations and territories to pollutant NO2. This layer refers to the exposure for the agglomeration area (ZAG) in Île-de-France to the "40 μg/m3 annual average NO2" criterion for the year 2017. The following values are shown in the layer: nbre_hab_expo: number of inhabitants exposed to surface area_expo: exposed area in km2longur_voirie_expo: road length exposed in km']

Name: exp idf zag 2017 pm10 35j sup 50ug
Description: ['Population and Territory exposure to PM10 pollutant. This layer concerns the exhibition for the area of agglomeration (ZAG) in Île-de-France with the criterion "35 days greater than 50μg/m3" for the year 2017. The following values are shown in the layer: nbre_hab_expo: number of inhabitants exposed to surface area_expo: exposed area in km2longur_voirie_expo: road length exposed in km']

Name: exp idf zag 2017 pm10 moyenne annuelle 40
Description: ['Population and Territory exposure to PM10 pollutant. This layer concerns the exposure for the Agglomeration Area (AAG) in Île-de-France to the "40 μg/m3 annual average in PM10" for the year 2017. The following values are shown in the layer: nbre_hab_expo: number of inhabitants exposed to surface area_expo: exposed area in km2longur_voirie_expo: road length exposed in km']

Name: Exposition à la pollution atmosphérique dans le projet Gazel'Air
Description: ['Annual PM2.5 concentration, PM10, NO2, O3, SO2, benzene, 1989 to 2008']

Name: Fichier des logements à la commune
Description: ['The file contains both quantitative and localized information describing housing, but also on its occupants. The presence of a unique and stable housing identifier in time allows to reconstitute the housing routes']
Exposure factor category: Indicateurs socio-démographiques| polluants de l'air intérieur

Name: HAM HAP METAUX 2019 2020
Description: ['Average annual concentrations of HAM-HAP and metals per station']

Name: Hydrotéléray
Description: ['Continuous measurement in wastewater']

Name: ind idf agglo
Description: ['ATMO']

Name: Installations industrielles
Description: ['This data set corresponds to facilities classified for environmental protection (ICPE) subject to authorization or registration (in construction, operation or termination of activity). The update frequency of this data set is daily.']
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol| polluants de l'air

Name: Inventaire de la nature des sols et de leur distribution spatiale
Description: ['The IGCS (Inventory, Management and Soil Conservation) program aims to identify, define and locate the main types of soil in a region or territory, and to characterize their properties of interest to agriculture and the environment. The information produced is stored in the national DONESOL database.']
Related Datasets: BDAT, BDETM, BDCF, European Soil Database
Geographical information level: Point de mesure et plage cartographique (coordonées x| y)

Name: Inventaire et situation des déchets
Description: ['Description of the physical nature of waste; Description of waste packages, packaged volumes (stocks and forecasts), waste activity (stocks and forecasts), toxic chemicals']

Name: Inventaire National Spatialisé des émissions atmosphériques
Description: ['Acidification, eutrophication, greenhouse effect, ETM, POP, PAH, Powders. Classified by category. A total of 641 substances.']
Subthématic: Emissions atmosphériques des secteurs de l'industrie, du transport, tertiaire et agricole

Name: Limites administratives
Description: ['Administrative limits of local authorities, continuous updates.Regions, departments, cantons, communes, arrondissements (for Paris, Lyon and Marseille) and public institutions of intercommunal cooperation (EPCI).']

Name: mes idf horaire no2
Description: ['Measurements to stations for pollutant NO2. The stations are those of the European minimum. The hourly data for the last 24 hours are updated daily at 14h (local).']

Name: mes idf horaire nox
Description: ['Measurements to stations by pollutant and temporal granulometry.']

Name: mes idf horaire o3
Description: ['Measurements to stations by pollutant and temporal granulometry.']

Name: mes idf horaire pm10
Description: ['Measurements to stations by pollutant and temporal granulometry.']

Name: mes idf horaire pm25
Description: ['Measurements to stations for PM2.5 pollutant. The stations are those of the European minimum. The hourly data for the last 24 hours are updated daily at 14h (local).']

Name: Mesures de bruit dans l'agglomération de Grenoble
Mesures de bruit dans l'agglomération de Lyon
Description: ['LDEN (Day,Evening and Night): a weighted sound level A calculated on the three hourly periods, day (6h-18h), evening (18h-22h), night (22h-6h). LNight: A-weighted sound level over the night period (22h-6h)']

Name: Mimausa
Description: ['Location of mining sites, available data on mining sites (synthetic sheets, detailed fact sheets)']

Name: Modèle global de chimie atmosphérique et de transport
Description: ['Results of the French chemical composition and air transport forecasting model (MOCAGE Quality of the Air) in the form of grid-point forecasting fields for 120 gas species (Ozone, CO, CO2, U.V. etc.) and 4 aerosols (carbon, desert, anthropogenic and marine). Parameters, levels, deadlines and areas set out according to various resolutions and deadlines from 12 to 108 h by 1h, 3h or 6h on the world (forcing by a global model), or France (forcing by a limited-air model)']

Name: Natura 2000
Description: ['European, terrestrial and marine natural sites identified for the scarcity or fragility of wild, animal or plant species and their habitats.']

Name: Observatoire national de Mesure et d’Evaluation en zone Rurale de la pollution Atmosphérique à longue distance
Description: ['Atmospheric depositions (major inorganic compounds, heavy metals, PAHs), gaseous compounds (O3, NO2, Volatile Organic Compounds) and particulate matter (gravimetry of PM10 and PM2.5, heavy metals and PAHs in PM10, PM2.5 specification) and weather parameters']

Name: Occupation du sol à grande échelle
Description: ['Visualization of meadow areas, soil impermeability rates, metropolitan France and overseas departments and regions (DROM). 2015 version and 20 meters resolution.']

Name: ORANHE
Description: ['Noise and air quality mapping calculated by Cerema']

Name: ORHANE
Description: ['Location of Air / Bruit co-exposure areas']

Name: Orientation, taille, statut et mode de faire-valoir des exploitations
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation

Name: Pesticides dans les eaux souterraines
Description: ['Information on contamination of groundwater by pesticides is regularly disseminated. They are based on the use of data from the groundwater monitoring network, which includes nearly 2,200 measurement stations spread over French territory (metropolis and overseas).']

Name: plaMADE
Description: ['Traffic data collected from border infrastructure managers']

Name: Plan d’exposition au bruit
Description: ['The PEB is a graphical document on the scale of the 1/25000th that defines four areas of discomfort quantified by the Level day evening night index (Lden).']

Name: Plan de gêne sonore
Description: ['Visualization of sound discomfort plans (PGS) at airports. Sound embarrassment plans delineate areas in which residents can benefit from sound housing support']

Name: Point d'eau ADES
Description: ['Each water point has a national code. This is the water point file code in the Bank of the Sub-Sol (BSS). It consists of the concatenation of the BSS index (10 characters) and the BSS designation (6 characters) separated by a character "/". Each water point is located by its geographic coordinates within the framework of a projection system and attached to the municipality on the territory of which it is located. The allocation of the commune, altitude, the geographic coordinates at the water point is under the responsibility of the regional geological services of the BRGM as part of its management mision of the BSS. Water point information is the responsibility of the managers of the different functions of the water point.']

Name: Pollens et moisissures
Description: ['Concentrations in air of pollen and air molds Allergic risk index']
Subthématic: A􏰃robiologie, Qualit􏰃 de l􏰁air : pollens, moisissures

Name: PREV'AIR
Description: ['Operational air quality forecasting system. Modelling ozone concentrations, NO2, PM10, PM2.5, on average daily and in hourly peaks on Europe and France']

Name: Principales cultures par tranche de superficie et par petites régions agricoles
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['SetMoins 1 hectareFrom 1 to less than 5 hectaresFrom 5 to less than 10 hectaresFrom 10 to less than 20 hectaresFrom 20 to less than 30 hectaresFrom 30 to less than 50 hectaresFrom 50 to less than 70 hectares70 hectares or more']

Name: Produits Biocides
Description: ['Reported biocide product database']

Name: Quadrige 2
Description: ['Physical, chemical and biological parameters for describing the French coastline environment, More than 1500 parameters in base in 2018. Followed parameters: Chemical ContaminantsHydrologyPhytoplanctonBenthos of furniture substratesBenthos of hard substrate - CoralBenthos of hard substrate - Fish']

Name: Recensement Général Agricole
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['The General Agricole Census provides statistics on the number of farms, the technical-economic orientations of the municipalities, the agricultural surfaces used, the productions and areas concerned, the areas still grassy, and the main grasslands. These data are therefore qualitative, and communal.']

Name: Registre Français des émissions polluantes
Description: ['This pollutant release and transfer register (PRTR) is a national inventory:- chemical substances and/or potentially hazardous pollutants released into air, water and soil- of the production and processing of hazardous and non-hazardous waste Annual report of wastes and emissions polluting in air, water, soil by operators of classified facilities subject to the Order of January 31, 2008; The statements cover 160 pollutants in air and water, 130 in soil and about 850 wastes']

Name: Registre Parcellaire Graphique
Description: ['The graphical register is a geographical database used as a reference to the instruction of aids of the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP).']
Volume: impossible de télécharger les données via datagouv (error proxy)

Name: Réseau de mesure pour la mesure de la qualité des eaux de surface
Data Format (DCAT AP): MapInfo TAB file| KML| Esri Shape| PNG| PDF

Name: Réseau de Mesures de la Qualité des Sols (RMQS)
Description: ['Follow-up of 2,200 sites spread evenly over the French territory (metropolis and overseas) according to a square mesh of 16 km side; Physico-chemical analysis; Elements traces; Ground occupations; Cultural practices; organic pollutants (HAP, Dioxins, Furans, PCBs, organochlorinated pesticides); biological analyses']
Exposure factor category: Polluants du sol| composés organiques| métaux
Related Datasets: Quelques jeux de données et cartes sont téléchargeables sur le portail de l'INRA ; Ce jeu de données rassemble le résultats du calcul d'indice de seuils de détection d’anomalies en ETM dans les sols. Ces seuils correspondent à des vibrisses qui ont été calculées à partir des teneurs en éléments traces du RMQS situées dans un rayon de 50 km autour du point considéré, avec un minimum de 10 points pour les horizons 0-30 cm et 30-50 cm.

Name: REseau national de suivi à long terme des ECOsystèmes FORestiers
Description: ['General description of the site Dendrometric measurements Observation of the health of the population Description of soil profiles Physico-chemical monitoring of soils Inventory of the floristic composition Phenological monitoring of the population Monitoring of the mineral nutrition of trees Following of the litter falls Monitoring of off and under forest cover atmospheric deposition Monitoring of soil solutions chemistry Meteorological monitoring Monitoring of ozone concentrations of air and associated symptoms on vegetation']
Data Format (DCAT AP): Excel XLS| CSV| Plain text| HTML

Name: RUMEUR
Description: ['Measurement data and noise indicators (energy indicators, event indicators, Harmonica general public index) from the permanent stations in Bruitparif (over 50 permanent stations) as well as measurement campaigns (over 600 short-term measurements). The number of measuring sites is increasing steadily.List of noise peaks related to aircraft overflights on airport noise measurement stations (with associated acoustic characteristics)']

Name: SINOE
Description: ['Location of waste processing sites, operator names, site description of wastes, analysis of waste management costs']

Name: SISE-Eau
Description: ['Collections from January to December 2020']

Name: Surveillance de la qualité de l'air dans les établissements recevant du public
Description: ['General description of the establishment (type of construction, ventilation,...), corresponding sampling and analysis of substances covered by the decree of January 05, 2012']
Subthématic: Qualité de l'air dans les établissements recevant du public
Temporal Coverage: 2 prélèvements sur une année par établissement

Name: Système d'information en Santé-Environnement sur les Eaux
Organizations: DGS / Ministère de la Santé et des Solidarités
Description: ['General description of water capture, production and distribution facilities; Description of bathing sites; Description of monitoring points; Results of analyses of the health control of water for human consumption, mineral water, bathing water and for some departments of pool water']

Name: Téléray
Description: ['gamma raying in ambient air']

Name: Utilisation du territoire
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation

Name: Vignes
Organizations: SSP  /  Ministère de l'Agriculture et de l’Alimentation
Description: ['Number of farms by cultivating Area of crop (ares)Agricultural area used (SAU) (hectares) Standard gross product (PBS) (1000 euros)Work volume (UTA)']

Name: Xenair
Description: ['The XENAIR project will investigate the association of breast cancer risk (overall and by hormone receptor status) with chronic to selected air pollutants, including particulate matter, nitrogen dioxide (NO2), ozone (O3), BaP, dioxins, PCB-153, and cadmium. A convention was developed by ATMO France with the Centre de recherche Léon Bérard to value data from Gazel Air as part of the Xenair project, funded by the ARC Foundation for Cancer Research.']

Name: Zones sensibles - France entière
Description: ['Article R211-94 of the Environmental Code, transposing in French law Article 5 and Appendix II of the Urban Residual Disequilibration Directive (91/271/EEC UWWT) defines sensitive areas such as water masses that are particularly sensitive to pollution, including those that are determined to be eutrophic or may become eutrophic in the short term if measures are not taken']

Name: Zones vulnérables - Historique
Description: ['Each vulnerable area corresponds to a prefectural order (prefect basin coordinator) after advice from the Hygiene Departmental Council, the General and Regional Council and the Basin Committee. Vulnerable areas are reviewed at least every 4 years. The perimeter of vulnerable areas is defined by administrative division of basin according to 2 modalities:1) Municipal limits: It extends to the limit of all municipalities designated in vulnerable areas.2) Cadastral limits (infra-communal): It covers cadastral sections for municipalities designated in vulnerable areas.']

Name: Zones vulnérables - Métropole
Description: ['Each vulnerable area corresponds to a prefectural order (prefect basin coordinator) after advice from the Hygiene Departmental Council, the General and Regional Council and the Basin Committee. Vulnerable areas are reviewed at least every 4 years. The perimeter of vulnerable areas is defined by administrative division of basin according to 2 modalities:1) Municipal limits: It extends to the limit of all municipalities designated in vulnerable areas.2) Cadastral limits (infra-communal): It covers cadastral sections for municipalities designated in vulnerable areas.']
